text: Balinese (ᬪᬵᬱᬩᬮᬶ ᬩᬲᬩᬮᬶ; Basä Bali) is a Malayo-Polynesian language which belongs to the Austronesian language family. It is spoken by the Balinese people on the island of Bali in Indonesia. It is written in both Balinese script and Latin script. == References == Category:Languages of Asia Category:Bali Category:Austronesian languages
title: Balinese language
